document_data.name: Taghor
document_data.mainbody: '''Taghor''' was a [[dwarf]] [[fighter]] who almost died during a fight against [[drow]] ''circa'' [[1358 DR]].
document_data.Possessions: The fighter donned [[chainmail]] and a dwarven [[helmet]], and fought with an [[axe]].
document_data.History: Taghor was a warrior of King [[Teirgoh]], and fought with him against the dark elves beneath [[Waterdeep]]. Whilst trying to stop the drow from assaulting the royal family, he almost met his death at the blade of a drow. He may have later been healed by the party setting out to slay [[Xanathar]], and if so, he informed them that his king was grievously wounded, and Prince [[Keirgar]] had been kidnapped. He thanked the adventurers for saving him from death, but could not offer them a reward, as he had become separated from his clan during the battle. The fighter offered to join the adventurers, and told them whereabouts his clan had settled on the lower level.
